snippet.title: FAITH: Chapter III - Use your holy crucifix to perform exorcisms and fight back possessed cultists!
snippet.description:
Purchase on itch.io https://new-blood.itch.io/faith-the-unholy-trinity?ac=qfCyYFQF-yt FAITH: The Unholy is a pixel horror game by Airdorf. Use your holy crucifix to perform exorcisms, fight back against possessed cultists, and cleanse haunted objects. Discover a world of dread, isolation, and mystery as you explore haunted forests, abandoned churches, and the inner sanctums of a Satanic cult.

➡️ More from Airdorf https://airdorf.itch.io/?ac=qfCyYFQF-yt
➡️ More horror games https://itch.io/games/tag-horror?ac=qfCyYFQF-yt

#itchio #indiegames #horror
